column3: department FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT' AND salary > 50000;

input_query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM orders WHERE total_price > 1000 GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
column3: COUNT(*) as order_count FROM orders WHERE total_price > 1000 GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;

input_query: SELECT AVG(price) FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
column3: AVG(price) FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' GROUP BY category;

input_query: SELECT * FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id WHERE c.country = 'USA';
optimized_query: SELECT * FROM orders o INNER JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE c.country = 'USA';
